类 BigTwo

  • java.lang.Object
    • BigTwo
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CardGame
    直接已知子类:
    Tester

    public class BigTwo
extends java.lang.Object
implements CardGame
    This class is used to model a Big Two card game. It stores the a deck of cards, players, hands of cards on table, the index of current player and a console as an interface for players.
    作者:
    davidliu

      • start

        public void start(Deck deck)
        从接口复制的说明: CardGame
        Starts the card game.
        指定者:
        start 在接口中 CardGame
        参数:
        deck - the deck of (shuffled) cards to be used in this game

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main function. It should create a Big Two card game, create and shuffle a deck of cards, and start the game with the deck of cards

      • composeHand

        public static Hand composeHand(CardGamePlayer player,
                               CardList cards)
        A method for returning a valid hand from the specified list of cards of the player
        参数:
        player - The current player who is going to play the cards
        cards - The cards from which a valid hand is going to be returned from
        返回:
        The valid hands from the given cards; if no valid hand, return null

        从接口复制的说明: CardGame
        Makes a move by the player.
        指定者:
        makeMove 在接口中 CardGame
        参数:
        playerID - the playerID of the player who makes the move
        cardIdx - the list of the indices of the cards selected by the player
